articles.description: Arsenal's vital win over Tottenham must be the catalyst for both their Premier League title challenge and a striker search, says BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Arsenal 2-1 Tottenham: Why derby win must be title catalyst for Arteta and co

articles.description: Emma Raducanu earns a dogged win over Amanda Anisimova to reach the Australian Open third round - where she faces Iga Swiatek -  for the first time.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025: Emma Raducanu beats Amanda Anisimova and faces Iga Swiatek in Melbourne next

articles.description: With Alexander Isak in "red-hot form" and Newcastle on a club record-equalling winning run, what can they achieve this season?
articles.title: 'Alexander Isak is in red-hot form' - but are Newcastle United in Premier League title race?

articles.title: Rangers vs Aberdeen: Scottish Premiership live coverage, stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.title: Everton 0-1 Aston Villa: David Moyes' return ruined by Ollie Watkins winner in Premier League

articles.description: Lyon are knocked out in the last 32 of the Coupe de France on penalties by an amateur team from the fifth tier of French football.
articles.title: Bourgoin-Jallieu 2-2 Olympique Lyonnais (4-2 on pens): Lyon beaten by fifth-tier amateurs in Coupe de France
